summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the improvement of W. Dravus St. from 30th Ave. W. to 26th Ave. W., on the South; and a certain other street and avenues; by constructing underground utilities lines and a residential street lighting system; all in accordance with Resolution 26118 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
